data.name: pattern_EditMessage
data.value:
h1.Discussion Edited: "$EntityTitle":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/projects/messages.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID&ID=$EntityID"

$AdditionalData.get_item("MessagePreview")
#foreach($fileInfo in $AdditionalData.get_item("Files").Keys)
#beforeall
----------------------------------------
#each
"$fileInfo":"$AdditionalData.get_item("Files").get_item($fileInfo)"
#end
"Read more":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/projects/messages.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID&ID=$EntityID"
Your portal address: "$__VirtualRootPath":"$__VirtualRootPath"
"Edit subscription settings":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL"

data.name: pattern_ProjectEditRequest
data.value:
h1.Project change request: "$ProjectTitle":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/projects/projects.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID"
"$__AuthorName":"$__AuthorUrl" has requested to change settings for the project ["$ProjectTitle":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/projects/projects.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID"].
table(edit_request). ||(edit_request_column). Old Value |(edit_request_column). New Value | |(edit_request_title). Title |(edit_request_data). $AdditionalData.get_item("Title_Old") |(edit_request_data). $AdditionalData.get_item("Title_NEW") | |(edit_request_title). Description |(edit_request_data). $AdditionalData.get_item("Description_Old") |(edit_request_data). $AdditionalData.get_item("Description_NEW") | |(edit_request_title). Responsible |(edit_request_data). $AdditionalData.get_item("ProjectLeader_Old") |(edit_request_data). $AdditionalData.get_item("ProjectLeader_NEW") |
"Moderate":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/projects/projects.aspx"
Your portal address: "$__VirtualRootPath":"$__VirtualRootPath"
"Edit subscription settings":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL"
